alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 16 at 5:44PM AKST until November 17 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
